children.text: Hi my name is Omar, I'm a software engineer that specializes in creating great front end experiences, primarily using react. When I'm not engineering I like to game and make music.

title: My Blog - Web Development Insights & Tutorials
description: Discover modern web development techniques, tutorials, and insights. Learn React, Next.js, TypeScript, and performance optimization from real-world examples.
keywords: web development, React, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, performance, tutorials, programming, frontend
